description: This file defines API routes for inference operations, including full inference processing and streaming inference results for a claim verification pipeline. It uses FastAPI's routing mechanisms and calls various services for text sentencization, claim detection, search, scoring, and streaming events.

classes.name: SentenceChunk
classes.description: Data model representing a sentence chunk with its text, optional character offsets, and claim flag.

methods.name: InferenceResponse run_inference( payload: InferenceRequest, response: Response, label: Dict[str, Any] = Depends(label_context), )
methods.description: Handles the POST request to run the full inference pipeline, including sentence splitting, claim detection, search, scoring, and returns an aggregated response.

methods.name: stream_inference( payload: InferenceRequest, response: Response, user: Dict[str, Any] = Depends(auth_required), label: Dict[str, Any] = Depends(label_context), )
methods.description: Handles the POST request to stream inference results incrementally as NDJSON, emitting sentence, evidence, score, and completion events.

ctags.name: run_inference
ctags.signature: ( payload: InferenceRequest, response: Response, label: Dict[str, Any] = Depends(label_context), )

ctags.name: stream_inference
ctags.signature: ( payload: InferenceRequest, response: Response, user: Dict[str, Any] = Depends(auth_required), label: Dict[str, Any] = Depends(label_context), )
